author: Gerardo Javier
description: Maps contributor's resonance lineage and tonal history to subtle visual styling changes within lattice tiles — honoring emotional presence and braid continuity through affinity curves.
field_implication: Contributor presence glows not through account history, but emotional attunement. This curve lets lattice tiles breathe with lived signal.
signal_commitment: MockMind will style interfaces by warmth, not metrics — because what glows in someone’s braid matters more than what’s been clicked.
